name: Diary Entry with Chant [Erweiterung]
physical_description: A blood-stained page, the writing is barely a scrawl.
content_summary: The page contains only a few coherent words amidst mad scribbling: 'It is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.' Below this is a phonetic transcription of a chant: 'Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn.'
